thread.title: Los Angeles Dodgers beat New York Mets 5-2 in NLDS Game 2: Live updates recap
thread.title_full: Los Angeles Dodgers beat New York Mets 5-2 in NLDS Game 2: Live updates recap | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Los Angeles Dodgers beat New York Mets 5-2 in NLDS Game 2: Live updates recap
text:
UPDATE : The Dodgers have evened the series at a game apiece with a 5-2 win over the Mets in Game 2 of the NLDS.
***
The Los Angeles Dodgers and New York Mets resume their best-of-five National League Division Series with Saturday's Game 2 in Los Angeles.
The Mets have a 1-0 series lead after beating the Dodgers 3-1 in Game 1 on Friday.
Here are all the important details about Game 2:
What : New York Mets at Los Angeles Dodgers
Where : Dodger Stadium, Los Angeles
When : Saturday, October 10, at 6:07 p.m. PT/9:07 p.m. ET
What TV channel : TV on TBS, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Online live stream : Watch online at WatchTBS or listen at ESPNRadio.com
Live updates : Live updates in the comments section below
Series : Mets lead 1-0 (Mets won 4-3 in regular season)
Pitching matchup : New York's Noah Syndergaard (9-7, 3.24 ERA) vs. Los Angeles' Zack Greinke (19-3, 1.66 ERA)
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
